New Records: The Boston Celtics have won 24 of their last 25 road games against opponents who are on the second leg of a back-to-back
Key Match Events: The Celtics set the tone with 40 points in the first quarter and had a pivotal 7-0 run in the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics have a strong record in road games against teams on the second leg of a back-to-back
The Hornets have struggled against Atlantic Division opponents with a winning record
The Celtics have covered the spread in each of their last six games with both teams on the second leg of a back-to-back
The Hornets have failed to cover the spread in each of their last four night games at Spectrum Center
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics needed to respond after losing their first game of the season
The Hornets were more competitive throughout three quarters of the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Twelve of the Hornets' last 13 games against Eastern Conference opponents have gone OVER the total points line
Seven of the Celtics' last eight games as favorites against the Hornets have gone OVER the total points line
The Celtics are missing key players like Kristaps Porzingis and Al Horford
The Hornets have a full squad once again
Others: The Celtics and Hornets are meeting after the Celtics blew past the Hornets in a 124-109 road win last night
The Hornets exploded for 42 points in the second quarter
